nodes.text: Kevin Christley is a member of the 501st Legion, where he is the former Editor in Chief of the 501st Legion's Static Burst magazine and former Detachment Leader of the 501st Special Operations Detachment. He's also a member of the Rebel Legion and the current Restoration Lead for Lucasfilm's 3/4-scale T-65 X-wing starfighter based out of the Wings over the Rockies Air Museum at Lowry, Colorado. The X-wing fighter has been displayed at Star Wars Celebration, Celebration III, and Celebration IV. Kevin is featured on page 174 of the 2008 Guinness Book of World Records as the 501st Legion stormtrooper proudly carrying the flag of Finland in Lucasfilm's entry at the 2007 Rose Parade.

He authored the article "Inside the 501st," published in Star Wars Insider 96, and often works with Lucasfilm and their marketing partners, such as M&M Mars and Del Rey, to coordinate volunteer staffing at promotional events.
